sub_title: Sales, Marketing, Events and Autosport Professional |  Owner at Corsa Events | Sales Manager at O-Rouge
summary:
The first episode of my professional experience started in 2005, when I started at Fontys Bedrijfshogeschool to study Commercial Economics - International Event, Music and Entertainment Studies.

Due to my huge interest in cars and racing; I started an own company/website back in 2006, named RacingInside.com, which became one of the most visited websites about racing in Europe with background stories.

In 2007- 2008; I did an internship at Sanoma Men's Magazines at the department of Digital Media. 

In 2009, I have been working at RTL Nederland as an intern. I was working at the department called Concepts, which is developing the new television programmes/ideas of RTL Nederland.

In 2010 I became my Bachelor degree of Commercial Economics - International Event, Music and Entertainment Studies. 

From March 2010 until March 2013 I have been working at Velde Group, a recruitment agency which is focussed on commercial employees and positions: from account manager till commercial director/CEO.

From January 2014 until January 2015, I have been at the position of Junior Account Manager at DIT Bouw en Techniek. This company is specialized in the secondment and employment of technicians within industry, building industry, engineering and construction.

From April 2015 until September 2015, I have been at the position of Managing Consultant at Xelvin. This company is specialized in the secondment of employees. I was responsible for the section Building & Infrastructure.

From September 2015 to May 2017, I have been at the position of Account Manager Lead Office at Van Mossel. In May 2017 I switched to the Wassink Autogroep to become their Online Sales Trader. 

From July 2019 until December 2022, I am a Sales Consultant at AUTOROLA BV. This is the leader in automotive remarketing in Europe. From January 2023 until May 2023, I have been involved as Business Developer Sales in the same company.

In January 2017, I started my own company; Corsa Events. A company focussed on the  automotive industry by providing high-end track days and driver management.

Specialties: Marketing, Sales, PR, Communication, Television, Media, Events, Entertainment, Recruitment, Racing, Cars

profile_positions.description: O-Rouge is a high-end manufacturer of sim racing rigs and equipment. We are specialised in customisable and personalised products within professional sim racing. Because of our real racing experience; many teams and drivers acknowledge our true feeling and use it for coaching and training purposes. Besides that, our products are developed for eSports and sim racing enthusiasts too.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Corsa Events is a young and innovative company, which is mainly focussed on organizing high-end track days throughout Europe. Other activities are: racing events, corporate events, PR & marketing and driver management.

Combining the experience in events, automotive and racing makes Corsa Events distinctive in comparison to their competitors.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description:
In the role of Sales Business Development, I was responsible for new clients, opportunities and markets of Autorola The Netherlands. The main task was to expand the business of the company and make internal and external processes more efficient.
----
In de rol van Sales Business Development, was ik verantwoordelijk voor het verder uitdiepen van de business voor Autorola Nederland. De belangrijkste taak was het verder uitbreiden van de business en het intensiveren en efficiënter maken van de diverse interne en externe processen.
profile_positions.title: Sales Business Development

profile_positions.description:
As a sales consultant within Autorola (Nederland), I was responsible for a variety of customers in the B2B automotive market with the several services that Autorola provides and mainly responsible for their online trading platform. Autorola is a worldwide remarketing and business intelligence partner within automotive and the biggest online auction-house within Europe based on automotive.
---------
Als sales consultant binnen Autorola (Nederland), was ik op B2B-niveau verantwoordelijk voor een verscheidenheid aan klanten binnen de automotive die gebruikmaken van de services en het online platform wat door Autorola wordt geboden. Autorola is een wereldwijde organisatie met de focus op remarketing en business intelligence partnerships in automotive. Tevens vormt zij het grootste online veilingplatform binnen de automotive, in Europa.
profile_positions.title: Sales Consultant Marketplace

profile_positions.description:
My family owned this car company for over 60 years; with my dad being the owner from 1996 till selling the company and its compound on December 31, 2019.

I have been involved with the company during my whole life (mostly weekends). 

Due to the years of experience that I obtained in the family company, I am familiar to the total business in automotive: purchasing - administration - import and export - leasing - financing - customer support and sales.

profile_positions.description:
Xelvin is specialized in the secondment of entrepreneurial employees at the level of Higher Vocational Education and Academics. Through their dedication, flexibility, knowledge and proactive attitude they make the difference. Their unique approach in counseling and extensive training of technicians ensures that they are able to fulfil their ambitions and desired growth path.

At Xelvin they also believe in a personal touch, where both (customer and employee) are at the center of our attention. For both of them, the best solution is what they are looking for.

Within Xelvin, I was responsible for the section Building & Infrastructure in the South of The Netherlands in the role of Managing Consultant.
----------
Xelvin is gespecialiseerd in de detachering van ondernemende medewerkers op MBO+, HBO en WO niveau. Door hun gedrevenheid, flexibiliteit, kennis van zaken en proactieve instelling maken zij het verschil. De unieke aanpak van Xelvin in de begeleiding & uitgebreide trainingen van de technici zorgt ervoor dat zij in staat zijn de ambities en het door hen gewenste groeipad waar te maken. 

Bij Xelvin geloven zij dan ook in een persoonlijke touch, waarbij zowel klant als medewerker centraal staat en voor beiden gezocht wordt naar de beste oplossing.

Binnen Xelvin was ik verantwoordelijk voor het onderdeel Bouw & Infra binnen Zuid-Nederland in de rol van Managing Consultant.
